name: Fixer Boxer
description:
Box robots and AC Units.

Move with arrow keys or WASD or ZQSD and punch with spacebar.

Keep the city alive by punching AC units into working order when an exclamation point appears over them, punch the robots trying to attack you before they swarm you.

All AC units must be working for the city's health to go up, if even one has stopped, the city's health will go down.

Try to stay alive as long as possible.

Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6.

Sound effects from: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Font from: https://www.1001fonts.com/west-england-font.html
